i am a student.

i love music.
I am resourceful.

content.text: I hope you are having a great day.
Thanks! I am doing okay, just feeling a bit stressed out.
I am sorry to hear that. What's on your mind?
Just work, I have a lot on my plate right now and I am not sure how I am going to get it all done.
I see. I know how that feels. I am currently working on a project for school that is due tomorrow and I am really stressed out about it.
Oh no! That sounds really stressful. What is the project about?
It is a research paper on the history of the internet.
Wow, that sounds like a really interesting topic. I would love to hear more about it when you are done.
Sure, I can send you a copy when I am finished.
That would be great! Thanks!
No problem!
So, what do you like to do for fun to de-stress?
I like to listen to music, go for walks, and spend time with my dog.
Those all sound like great ways to relax. I love music too! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a variety of music, but I mostly listen to rock and alternative.
Cool! I like rock and alternative too. I also like country music.
I have never really been into country music, but I can appreciate it.
I know what you mean. It's not for everyone.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I like a lot of bands, but some of my favorites are The Killers, The Black Keys, and The Lumineers.
I have heard of all of those bands. I like The Killers and The Black Keys too.
They are both great bands!
I think we are going to get along just fine.
I think so too
